description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Set in a trance-like alternate gameworld,Octgaon combines frantic shootem’ up tactics with devilish puzzles to produce a unique hybrid experience Each of the four gem buttons correspond to 4 different enemy colors. Only the correct colored shot will destroy your enemy.
description.short: Set in a trance-like alternate gameworld,Octgaon combines frantic shootem’ up tactics with devilish puzzles to produce a unique hybrid experience Each of the four gem buttons correspond to 4 different enemy colors. Only the correct colored shot will destroy your enemy.
